main event: Two yellow discs were observed rapidly descending towards the ground near Philadelphia on April 30, 1950.
interesting points: The objects were circular and yellow in color., The sighting lasted approximately 3 minutes., The witness described the objects as being about 10-15 feet in diameter., The first object was seen to the South and disappeared towards the West., Witness provided detailed directional estimates for the object's position from true North.
witness description: Self-employed individual, age 51, with technical training in engineering.
